name: shattered (itch) (KuroiX, RedData)
description:
This game uses autostereograms to create a depth perception for the player. If you cannot see autostereograms, you won't be able to play this game.

However, seeing autostereograms can be practiced. The game has a short tutorial on how to see them, but if you are struggling, we advice you to practice it with some pictures you can find on the internet first, e.g. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autostereogram or https://www.magiceye.com/faq-items/help-how-do-i-see-in-3d/.

For SGJ participants: Come to room B if you want guidance for the learning experience.

Setting

In the beginning, there was nothing but pure void. In this world where nothing existed, Rormir decided to create two mirrors. One of them was the mirror of color, the other was the mirror of shape. The two mirrors were so powerful that each of their reflections created a new dimension and the void was filled. Together, they created the world we know today, Mirdrych.  However... one day, the mirror of shape shattered, and thus the dimensions were torn apart...

Can you find the broken mirror shard to bring the world back together?
